嬾字的基本解释

lǎn
同“懒”。

嬾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǎn］
［《廣韻》落旱切，上旱，來。］
亦作“孄1”。亦作“孏1”。亦作“1”。
懒惰；懈怠。

嬾字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬾； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页273第36
【唐韻】洛旱切。怠也。一曰臥也。女性多怠，故从女。◎按與懶同。　又讀平聲。【蘇軾·次毛滂詩】芋火對嬾殘。【註】嬾，讀若闌。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　 Lazy; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 273 36
[Tang Yun] Luo dry cut. Slowly. One said lying down. Women are more lazy, so they are female. ◎Press and lazy.　Read Ping Sheng again. [Su Shi·Ci Mao Pong Poem] Taro fire is for the lazy. [Note] Lazy, read Ruolan.
